short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to zoom in all profile images on LinkedIn. Tastefully, of course.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LinkedIn Zoomer: Enhance Your Professional Networking Experience

Ever felt like LinkedIn profile pictures were just too small? Say hello to LinkedIn Zoomer, the extension that brings you face-to-face with your professional network!

Key Features:
• Automatically enlarges profile pictures across LinkedIn
• Seamlessly integrates with the LinkedIn interface
• Works on profile pages, feed posts, and more
• Adds a touch of fun to your professional browsing

LinkedIn Zoomer tastefully magnifies profile images, allowing you to see your connections in greater detail. Whether you're trying to recognize an old colleague or just want a closer look at your network, this extension has got you covered.

Note: This extension is meant for entertainment purposes and to add a bit of fun to your LinkedIn experience. Use it responsibly and remember that professional etiquette still applies, even when zoomed in.

Upgrade your LinkedIn browsing today with LinkedIn Zoomer – because in the world of professional networking, every pixel counts!
